mapper.insert: insert into Logs (id, ObjectType, ObjectID, Operation, OperatorID, OperationTime, OperationData) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{objecttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objectid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{operation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operatorid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{operationtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{operationdata,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

insert into Logs (ObjectType, ObjectID, Operation, OperatorID, OperationData) values (#{objecttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objectid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{operation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operatorid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{operationdata,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update Logs set ObjectType = #{objecttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ObjectID = #{objectid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Operation = #{operation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OperatorID = #{operatorid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, OperationTime = #{operationtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, OperationData = #{operationdata,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, ObjectType, ObjectID, Operation, OperatorID, OperationTime, OperationData from Logs
